name: Tile Run
description:
Tile Run is a student learning project developed in Mobile Game Development (2nd Year course at George Brown College)

It was meant to showcase the capabilities of Android Studio and Java

Gameplay is simple, drag the cube across the screen and avoid collisions. The more you survive, the higher your score is.

Highlights:

  1. Procedurally generated collision walls
  2. Custom Audio player
  3. Custom drag interface
